---
title: "03-barplot"
output: html_document
---



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}

SharkAttackdata <- read.csv("../data/SharkAttackdata.csv")
```


```{r}
ggplot(SharkAttackdata, aes(continent)) +
  geom_bar() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) +
  facet_wrap(~year)

```
```{r}
ggplot(SharkAttackdata, aes(water_area)) +
  geom_bar() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90))


```
